opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Entergy Louisiana, Inc. v. Louisiana Public Service Commission

opinion:
537 U.S. 1152

ENTERGY LOUISIANA, INC.
v.
LOUISIANA PUBLIC SERVICE COMMISSION ET AL.

No. 02-299.

Supreme Court of United States.

January 17, 2003.

1

CERTIORARI TO THE SUPREME COURT OF LOUISIANA.

2

Sup. Ct. La. Certiorari granted. Brief of petitioner is to be filed with the Clerk and served upon opposing counsel on or before 3 p.m., Monday, March 3, 2003. Brief of respondents is to be filed with the Clerk and served upon opposing counsel on or before 3 p.m., Wednesday, April 2, 2003. A reply brief, if any, is to be filed with the Clerk and served upon opposing counsel on or before 3 p.m., Monday, April 21, 2003. This Court's Rule 29.2 does not apply. Reported below: 815 So. 2d 27.
